channel.title: Wierd armadyl,zamorak,saradomin boss glitch help pl0x
channel.description:
Ok well if you watch my youtube vid i made for it you can see becuz i had to show things and i maded the vid in 5mins or else i had to take alot of screens... this is the link [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nqtpx8zcGZE]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nqtpx8zcGZE[/url]
oh and yes i did add it in class5 and did put the models in the model file. ok so does anyone knows how to fix that?
For ppls that dont wanna watch video : this is what the glitch/bug w / e is : i did downloaded bosses i already had bandos boss on my client, that one work so i downloaded other bosses and added them to class5 and i added the models to model file list then i tested it and when i stand in the npc and right click on it i saw the name of it but when i moved like one place to right or left w / e. i didnt.
So thats it.

oh and yes i did add it in class5 and did put the models in the model file.
ok so does anyone knows how to fix that?
